Franz Liszt

Ballade no. 1 in D-flat major, S. 170

1848 · LW A117 · R. 15

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

This piece exists in an earlier version: Dernière illusion (no. 4) from Préludes et Harmonies poétiques et religieuses (S. 171d).

Liszt also wrote multiple album leaves on the main theme: at least four in A-flat major (S. 189a/1; LW A116) and one in D-flat major (S. 189a/2).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · I/9 · Z. A/B 8011 · Various Cyclical Works I · ed. Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok
  • Henle · HN 490 · ed. Ernst-Günter Heinemann / Rena Charnin Mueller

Duration: 7' 30"

Difficulty: 4.5
